A.I Studies Projects

Felipe Canales

Software Engineer

Read More

I am a Software Engineer with a strong passion for Artificial Intelligence and a dedication to leveraging cutting-edge technology to create innovative solutions. Currently, I work for American Express on the anti-money laundering team, where I am responsible for designing and implementing solutions to detect and prevent financial crimes.


Before joining American Express, I worked as a Software Engineer on the DevOps team at M&T Bank, where I honed my skills in automation and infrastructure management. Additionally, I gained valuable experience as a machine learning/data science intern at Linde plc, where I assisted in maintaining and expanding predictive models and data-driven solutions to improve operational efficiency.


I am a graduate of the University at Buffalo, where I earned both my Bachelor's and Master's degrees in Computer Science with a heavy focus on Artificial Intelligence. My passion for learning extends beyond the classroom, and I am constantly seeking new challenges and opportunities to expand my knowledge and skills. Whether it's exploring new programming languages or experimenting with emerging technologies, I am always eager to push the boundaries of what's possible and stay at the forefront of the tech industry.
